rooms.name: Entrance & Hallway
rooms.description: A minimalist design with minimalistic decor and efficient use of space. The entrance is strategically aligned according to Vastu principles for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living & Dining Area
rooms.description: The central open area with floor-to-ceiling windows providing ample natural light and a view of the outdoors. Minimalist furniture enhances functionality while adhering to a tight budget.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Compact kitchen designed with minimal cabinets and essential appliances. The layout respects Vastu by aligning the entrance with the main door of the house.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable sleeping area that maximizes natural light through a small window. Minimalist design is maintained with built-in storage to save space and cost.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A functional guest bathroom designed for basic needs while staying within budget and following Vastu guidelines for water placement.
